home.title: Welcome to WebEducationLab
home.description: Learn with interactive courses, access from any device, and improve your skills with us.
home.subtext: Thousands of users are already learning with us.
home.feature1Desc: Learn at your own pace with interactive and hands-on content.
home.feature2Desc: Receive a professional certificate upon successful course completion.
home.feature3Desc: Access our courses from any device, anytime.
home.planBasicDesc: Ideal for beginners, access to basic content.
home.planProDesc: For advanced users, includes additional materials.
home.planEnterpriseDesc: Complete solution for teams and companies.
home.ctaDescription: Start your learning journey with WebEducationLab.
home.comment1: An incredible platform for interactive learning, 100% recommended!
home.comment2: Excellent content, easy to follow and very useful to improve my technical skills.
